title: League will not Open not even the Launcher
body: Well I cannot start league made a ticket been waiting 18 hours for riot to reply but still nothing so I just wanted to ask for some help I really want to play league. I don't have any antiviruses and i did everything even when I uninstalled and reinstalled it when it says to launch the badge loads and then it crashes again. If I pull up task manager it says its running in the back round but nothing is showing please help

replies.body: Try upgrading from Windows XP. like wtf mane, its 2016
I only have 13 GB's of space and I can't upgrade to windows 10 its a pain.
well its been 2 days since I made the ticket and i just want to play league I would like it if anyone could help .-.

Since you've already submitted a ticket, I recommend being patient while a tech specialist gets back to you. Keep in mind that replying or "bumping" your ticket before a specialist gets back to you will cause it to be sent to the back of the queue. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
Anyone i'm super bored that i Cannot play league
